**Special Containment Procedures:** Evidence of SCP-6263's existence is generated daily via social media, but has proven insufficient to reveal the anomaly, as such, to the general public.[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]Simpatico-class anomalies pose unpredictable containment challenges but are otherwise non-threatening.[[/span]]  Personnel are encouraged to suppress the production of further evidence via public shaming of egregious typo policing.
----
**Description:** SCP-6263 is a phenomenon triggered by correcting the spelling or grammar of others. Said action incurs a statistically unlikely risk of immediately committing a similar error oneself, typically within the corrective statement, with the likelihood and severity increasing in proportion to the vehemence of the initial crrection.
